title: The Light Can Crush You with Upscale Vandal
description:
Y'all don't spend enough on guns, but a lot with the jeweler. We spent a bunch on guns and a lot with the jeweler. The Only Podcast That Matters™ is talking big shit this week because it’s backed the fuck up as we dial in our boy, the one, the only—creative director and marketing/lifestyle consultant—Mike Camargo aka Upscale Vandal. Mike is tapping in to talk working with Pusha T and J Balvin, being one of the first to bring the streets to the runway, anointing himself The Hood Anthony Bourdain, setting trends for rappers to ruin, making moves into gaming, rare snack flexing, why Valentine’s Day is cancelled and much more.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
